website_summaries.verdict: These are a throwback style that have recently become trendy again. If you want a classic style at a lower price, choose the aviators instead.
pros: Sports a solid nylon frame and glass lenses in an attractive style that compliments most men
They feel light and comfortable on the face
cons: The lenses aren't polarized, but they still provide excellent sun protection

customer_reviews.title: Logo wipes right off the lenses
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much 100% sure these are fake... The first time I went to clean them with a damp cloth, the Ray Ban logo wiped right off (you can see the remnants in the upper left). Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B Cabral

customer_reviews.title: By far the worst Amazon experience ever
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst Amazon experience ever. Glasses are beyond used. The lenses are scratched to the point where one can barely see through them, the frames are so rubbed and worn that most of the writing on the inside of the arms is worn off. The frames are stretched out and loose. Unbelievable. It makes me wonder what sort of method and protocol for selling repackaged products Amazon employs. Longtime Prime member, but it will be a while before I buy anything here again, especially open box or from Warehouse Deals. Just incredible.
customer_reviews.author: joeink

customer_reviews.title: Fake and child sized
customer_reviews.text: These are not real RayBans and they are clearly a child’s size.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was getting the smooth finish black plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was getting the smooth finish black plastic however I ended up with the black matte finish. I currently own the black matte on another pair and they are not very durable. Leaving them in a hot car causes the material to break down and become sticky. I wanted to get away from that matte finish.
customer_reviews.author: tigervet96

customer_reviews.title: Completely Genuine
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are amazing with tax i got these for $87 , i own ray bans before and even fakes. I know these are the real deal. The case smells like a baseball glove (leather) and the glasses are very sturdy. Keep in note that the "new wayfarers" (rb2132) have different hinges compared to original wayfarers and the style is completely different. If you are really wanting to see if they are real just take your sunglasses to sunglass hut to see if they are real. Sunglass hut is owned by ray ban (luxottica). Make sure you buy directly from amazon and not by an amazon seller. Anyways i am extremely satisfied with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made sunglasses but they just didn’t fit my face
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made sunglasses and they fit perfectly. I tried a couple of other models but the 2132/52 cm fit great. My face is a little more narrow so my eyes are closer together.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McClelland

customer_reviews.title: Authentic
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these sunglasses on black friday for $114 with a strong suspicion I might be sending them back, nope, real Ray Bans. Heavy duty metal hinges, "RB" etched inside the left lens, sturdy and clearly stamped logo on right lens. All printed information inside temple areas correct and authentic. I've worn origional Ray Ban Wayfarers for years and these New Wayfarers are just as comfortable. I bought the 58mm lens size because I have a larger head than most people and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Double check what you order
customer_reviews.text: Not what I ordered. I ordered shiny black with g15 black lenses. I got brown frames with brown lenses, what gives. Luckily the recipient (a birthday present) was ok with them, he thought they suited him so is keeping them but come on Amazon. The box was marked wrong. On the top of the box it said shiny black with black lenses and on the end of the box it said brown with brown lenses. I know he likes them but I am just really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: fay

customer_reviews.title: Reflected light at the center of the lenses
customer_reviews.text: I had the old Ray Ban which were excellent. These new ones are worthless. The light is reflected and creates a bright spot at the center of the lens. Someone simply make a bad design indication of Very low quality. This happens when the lenses are perfectly clean. Its a defect in design. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Prof. GAC

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not correctly represented in the photos
customer_reviews.text: Just got the pair described as Matte Havana / Blue. The colors are not even close to the photos. In the photos on Amazon they look royal blue and orange. They are in fact slate blue, almost gray, on the outside of the ear pieces, and basically coffee or caramel colored on the inside. While the look is still very cool, it is not accurate on this site at all. I own another pair of these that I have enjoyed for many years, and I am going to keep these, but be aware that the colors are pretty hard to pick out on this site and they are WAY off, like, not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Size is style preference not gender/age based!
customer_reviews.text: The one problem with the reviews I read was that people were claiming the 52 mm were for kids or women. I am a 22 year old guy with a bigger head but don't like glasses that dominate my face. I bought the 52 mm and can tell you they look great (girlfriends agree), and not feminine as the other reviewers would leave you to believe. It's more of a style preference. The other thing that is worth noting is that these lenses can pop out and be changed! Don't be discouraged if they only sell the frame you want with the incorrect lens type.
customer_reviews.author: Guinness

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a $20 pair of sunglasses kind of guy. I never understood why people pay a couple hundred bucks for them. So I finally took the plunge and bought a quality pair, these Ray-Ban Black on Transparent New Wayfarers. Now I understand the difference between these and the $20 pair. These fit perfectly and are super comfortable. The ultra classic shape will never go out of style and I've gotten numerous compliments on them already. I'm glad I spent the $114 as I'm sure I'll have these for a long time. I definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Dannen Vance

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for my wife and daughter and they both love them. Came in nice real leather cases with the velour lining, sealed lens cloth as well. Checked them over carefully..they have the BL etched into the glass and the ray ban logo enameled on the frame...so real! Frames are really nice and classy and they not only are nice to wear according to my wife but in my opinion are really beautiful on her face. Finally they are a nice weight solid but not heavy. I give them an A+
customer_reviews.author: J. Thillmann

customer_reviews.title: no stars
customer_reviews.text: classic cool! I thought these were "classic cool". The first time I washed them because the included lens wipe was just shmerring the glaze over the lenses I began to question whether or not these were "knock-offs". The first time that I washed these glasses the "Ray Ban" logo on the lenses wiped right off. I have owned a pair of yellow shooting glasses since the mid-1980's and the logo is still intact. I have to question whether this is a licensed seller or these or knock offs. Right now I am incredibly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tom & Karin

customer_reviews.title: Um... I love Ray-Bans but the flat black look cheap
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. Those you get at a gas station look about the same. The frames are rubber... rubber. And the New Wayfarer don't look like a sleek version of the classic original... they look like those wrap-around glasses you've seen guys wear at a million NASCAR events. Nothing against NASCAR, let's just say I had sartorial differences with many in the stands. I'd return them if I could, but apparently I can't. They work. That's something. And they're well made. But the styling is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Fake
customer_reviews.text: I just lost my Ray-Ban Wayfarers so replaced them with these. They are much, much lighter than my previous pair (which I had bought through Ray-Ban) and made a creaking sound every time I moved. I am sure they are fake, unless Ray-Bans quality tanked over the last year. Returned them ASAP and will buy through the store. If it is much cheaper than what you buy online, be aware.
customer_reviews.author: C. Conyngham

customer_reviews.title: ... I wear them they leave black smudges that look like charcoal all over my face
customer_reviews.text: I have Had These sunglasses for less than a week and every day that I wear them they leave black smudges that look like charcoal all over my face. Unsure as to why they have the finish coming off of them. I have owned many pairs of this collection and have never had them do this.
customer_reviews.author: Shay Northup

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shipment but good quality
customer_reviews.text: Received wrong frames. Perfect condition but very frustrating - I need to use ups during pandemic to return the frames in order to get the frames I actually ordered. I am trying to be understanding towards Amazon workers because I know they are dealing with a lot. I just feel forced to keep the clear frames although I almost despise them, and ordered black. Fit perfectly. I have a small face and they are snug and well-seated on my nose. They are the 55s. They are the real raybans.
customer_reviews.author: mds0710

customer_reviews.title: Timless style but not much of protection
customer_reviews.text: A good pair of sunglasses with timeless style. These appear to be good quality and authentic by RB. The matte black frames look more subtle, which I've got. However, these don't protect my eyes as much as others from the wind and Sun glare especially when the glare comes from the sides. Thick frame bezel feels more obstructed and obvious in the corner of my vision. Admittedly, I like RB glasses and style. So, that contributes somewhat to the decision of my purchase. If you're a RB product fan, I don't need to recommend. Otherwise, there are other glasses out there offer the same quality, better protection for less.
customer_reviews.author: Ben N

customer_reviews.title: Classics!
customer_reviews.text: I love Ray Ban Wayfarers, especially the "new" version. I bought the "rubberized" pair to wear for horseback riding and cycling. I sweat a lot for both, and the rubber (or whatever material it is) is good at "gripping" so the glasses stay put and don't slide. But you still get the cool Wayfarer look. And yes, comparing these to other pairs I own has convinced me that these are the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: Thatcher Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This product is FAKE. These small details are what give away fake from real ray bans. The engravment should be visible from the outside left lens not just on the inside. The paint or plastic that was used is also peeling off on the edge of the frames. The engraved RB on the inside of the left lens is also done poorly. The lettering on the frames are also cheap and you can almost just scratch them away.
customer_reviews.author: Erick G

customer_reviews.title: Not Unisex...Too small for women and man's heads
customer_reviews.text: These were tried on two different woman's heads and BOTH said they are way too small and feel like children's sunglasses...Saw review that stated this and ignored heeding and was left with no option but to return...WAY TOO SMALL for adult sized heads...bummer....
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: My first cool shades!
customer_reviews.text: After a lifetime of wearing eye glasses, I now can see without out corrective lenses. So, I looked for good sun glasses. Most of the less expensive models are poorly made, with inferior materials that distort my view. So, I gasped as I clicked Add To Cart buying these. They have been very good; I'm enjoying them. And, Sweetie says I look cool wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Portland Fella

customer_reviews.title: Tiny update but still classic.
customer_reviews.text: What more is there to say about wayfarers? There’s a reason they’ve been around decades. These are great update. Crystal green lenses, great style, and just a little bit of a clear accent to add a little something. Really hapoy with the fit of these. The slight inward angle of originals don’t really fit me good but i like the classic style so these are great for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Warren Durkin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glasses - BUT Product Description Incorrect!
customer_reviews.text: FIRST: Buyer Beware! These glasses are NOT polarized! I called Amazon before ordering, and were assured that they were, but when they arrived, they were not. GLASSES: Love the glasses, though. New Wayfarer style looks great and I love the soft matte finish of the frames, as opposed to the shiny black of the original (classic) Wayfarers. 52mm frames are good size for adult male with small-medium width head.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie George

customer_reviews.title: Real Authentic Ray-Bans
customer_reviews.text: If you want to wear REAL RAY-BANs, shop at trusted stores and be prepared to pay the full price for the glasses. Please understand that there are no AUTHENTIC Ray-Bans at half of the manufacturer's price. In addition to that, wearing fake glasses, is not good for your eyes. Yes, they are dark, but they don't block the harmful UV light. That's how the fakes are exposing your retinas to the bad part of the light spectrum. See, If you saved $80 from your hard earned money last month to buy yourself a fake pair of glasses, be patient for another month and buy the REAL DEAL. I purchased mine at the official Ray-Ban Amazon store.
customer_reviews.author: Papito Nick

customer_reviews.title: Authentic, great price and classic style!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of 52mm new wayfarers. My other pair is the black rubber. I am a smaller female and almost every pair of shades is too big. These fit perfect. I can put them on top of my head while looking down into the ocean and not worry about them falling off. Now this tortoise pair.. they slid a LOT. I took them to sunglasses but. The gal verified they were authentic and adjusted the bridge and now they fit very snug. The tint is just right, and the tortoise pattern is subdued. They are truly classy and lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Pruszynski

customer_reviews.title: very poor quality to be called Ray Ban
customer_reviews.text: The earpieces were splayed and could not be tightened. looking down they actually fell from my face. The glass was of appropriate shade but was clearer dead on then when looking down. The frames were way to noticeable and blocking of view. I was glad to send them back and be rid of them. At that price they should have been the best.
customer_reviews.author: Corena

customer_reviews.title: Not authentic looking?
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think these are authentic. They were not the same size as what I tried on in the sunglass hut.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses for the price
customer_reviews.text: These don’t feel cheap, they come with ray ban case and cloth and haven’t had any issues so I’d say authentic Ray Bans.
customer_reviews.author: Robby

customer_reviews.title: The color doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: After less than a week of wearing these, the grey color has turned a dirty yellow. It's not actual dirt, the rubber has changed color. Very disappointed after paying so much for these. Other than that they are fine, fit well, protect my eyes, look good.
customer_reviews.author: KnassBruckles

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous dark red sunglasses fit my small face
customer_reviews.text: Nicer than expected. I have a very small face and the 55mm for me perfectly. I purchased the red and they have a rubbery feel and a dark red color...just beautiful. Note the color is much more of a darker red than the picture. They are really nice glasses...
customer_reviews.author: Alison B. Stanford

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my daughter as a Christmas gift. I would not normally spend this much money on a pair of sunglasses (neither would she). However, she says that these are worth the money. Great quality and comfort. Springs on the hinges are quality and she doesn't worry about them breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consistent quality, good fitting shades, terrible case
customer_reviews.text: I've had three pairs of Ray Bans and they always fit the bill when it comes to style, durability, and versatility. I love the way the 52 mm fit and don't take up too much of your face. Only problem I have with this brand is the terrible quality of their carrying cases. I recently bought a pair of tortoise shell wayfarers and the case broke within a month. The top of the lid just torn off and it's easy to tell they are of very poor quality. For a pair of sunglasses that costs over $100 I wouldn't expect fine leather, but at least something that lasts a while. My only criticism.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I have a bad habit of losing sunglasses and I lost my Raybans a few weeks ago. Of course, the usual sunglass shops are closed for pandemic so I took a chance and got them on Amazon. Not disappointed. These are just as sturdy and nice as what I'd by at Sunglass Hut
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Authentic 58mm frame size! Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Authentic RayBans! Love them! I was hesitant due to some reviews but took a chance because the price was amazing. These are my 3rd pair of New Wayfarers over the years and my first from Amazon I was able to compare these glasses to my others very carefully so I’m positive they are authentic. Classic style that looks great on practically every face shape. Shipped very fast as well. I did receive the 58mm large frames in Tortoise frame with G15 dark lens.
customer_reviews.author: A. F.

customer_reviews.title: iconic look and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I owned a pair of these in the 90's, they never went out of style! Just received my New Wayfarer Ray Bans and the fit is Standard which is perfect; The rubber sides fit nice against my head, no slipping, very good clarity; Glad i purchased again!
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if the ones I got are counterfeit or if Ray-Ban's process has gotten sloppy but I bought a pair and exchanged with amazon for another and both had this sharp line, almost like they cast it but didn't bother finishing the edges, running all along the top and bottom of the frames and arms. It's super noticeable on my ears and nose and especially at the hinge, and looks pretty sloppy. I have a pair of RB2132s from about 10 years ago and they don't have this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelangelo

customer_reviews.title: frames just too large
customer_reviews.text: the frames fall off bc they are just too long: i have been a RB customer for many years and have never had this issue.I almost feel I've been sold fakes??
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses. I was warned by others that they are probably not “real” Ray-Bans but they look just like the ones I found in Macy’s and are very well made. The lenses are just the right darkness. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bas

customer_reviews.title: FAKE Ray-Bans
customer_reviews.text: First of all, when we took them out of the package, they felt very cheap. The plastic is light and there were obvious mold marks on the edges. After watching a few videos and reading a few articles, I am sure they are fake. I looked for the "Handmade in Italy" marks and they just say "Made in Italy". There were seams on the edges of the arms like they were made from a mold. The last thing that made me certain were the hinges. They are supposed to have five barrels on the hinges and these only have one. We're very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Used, open product
customer_reviews.text: If I pay 150.00 for a pair of sunglasses as a gift, I expect new glasses with packaging. I am so tired of buying stuff that is delivered used and has to be returned...It was a last minute Christmas gift and honestly now I have to ask for it back and return it. Ticks me off.
customer_reviews.author: k8tydid

customer_reviews.title: Not for this guy. Way to big On the face.
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw these I loved the look and decided to order a pair. For reference I always use Smith optics primarily the Maverick style which are quite a bit different. I receive the Ray Ban wayfarers in 55mm tortoise shell and right away they look almost comical on me. Way too big for my face. Granted this isn't then sunglasses fault but they look very wide and sit far off the face. I wish the tortoise shell came in a 52mm although I still think that might be too big. Great looking sunglasses just be careful the style fits your face. These are going back. Definitely free returns by Amazon helps.
customer_reviews.author: CigarDaze

customer_reviews.title: I think these are fakes!!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are fakes!! They creak like crazy at even the lightest flex. I have owned many pairs of ray-bans and non of them have creaked. You buy Ray-Ban specifically because of their quality and how their fit and finish is.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Martin

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: The box did not come completely sealed, although the Rayban look new. I didn't like them arriving like this. Still in full review and hoping they are not fake. After a complete review I can determine if they are original, but I did not like how it came packaged. 1 star for that..
customer_reviews.author: Pernalete Valles

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME SUNGLASSES
customer_reviews.text: Im Extremely impressed these are so easy on your eyes in the brite light. But be careful to get your size. Mine was 58mm the common size is 50mm so make sure you get the right millimeter.These are hella AWSOME sun glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Bonziamaster

customer_reviews.title: Works for me. No eye fatique. Make sure you get authentic pair.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two pairs, this one (black) and the one with a rubber-feel frame. I like them both. I paid about $70 for each, which is a good price but I still think these things are overpriced if you think that they're mostly plastic. The lens, however, is of great quality. I have no means to scientifically test them of course but I wearing these for many hours in bright sunlight I don't get eye fatigue, which is a problem for me with cheap pairs. I was apprehensive about buying them online since there lots of fakes out there, and on Amazon. Do your research and find out how the real ones differ from the fakes.
customer_reviews.author: GeorgeNY

customer_reviews.title: wow, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I managed to score these at such a great price. as other reviewers say, they are definitely not fake. (there are many sources online that can help you determine that. new wayfarers have a slightly different style of hinge, look at the 360 view on the ray ban site for comparison.) minor con: the fit was weird and way too loose, but a lot of eyewear stores will do adjustments for you no questions asked. my guy straightened out the curved arms and bent the frames in the middle, which created a better pinch on the nose. now they fit amazingly well, and I love how they look on me! super classic.
customer_reviews.author: b

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but I don't like the blue tint.
customer_reviews.text: These fit really good. I was able to pick the smaller size since I have a peanut sized head, most glasses don't fit well. The only problem I have with them is I like a warmer tone, these have a blue tint.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Please Keep in I have a fat head
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the buy, I bought these four years ago, and they are still going strong and amazing. For some people these Wayfarer are large for their heads, especially if my friends borrow my sunglasses, however if you have a larger head, they are definitely worth the purchase, if not I would recommend looking into the Old (style) Wayfarer or something Oakley makes that is similar in style. Also there are a few differences between the New and Old, aside from how it fits on one's head, and that would be the bracket that holds the arm to the frame, so keep that in if you were to look into other forms of the Wayfarer.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Manolakis

customer_reviews.title: There's a reason you pay more for these.
customer_reviews.text: They're that good. The difference between these and my 'cheap' glasses is really something. I can't see myself ever going back to gas station-grade glasses after these. 100% worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: willdrumforfood01

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: After reading several reviews I went with the what several people said; the glasses were the real thing. I’m glad I trusted the reviews, they are the real thing and I couldn’t be happier especially since I only paid $116 for glasses that I’d seen everywhere else for $150-175!
customer_reviews.author: Ray E.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for women
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Was so thrilled to find them at this price, with free shipping. Ordered from this seller and they arrived quickly. Came in nice box with pleather? leather? case and cleaning cloth. I'm extremely disappointed that they don't seem to fit my face as well as my other Ray Bans. They nose piece and the sides of the sunglasses are too big, for me at least. I'll have to have them tightened I guess. My boyfriend tried them on and they seemed to fit him perfectly. I know they are advertised for men - but was hoping they would fit me as well.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Never out of Style - Always Cool - Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son a few years back, he got himself a new pair of Ray Bans he likes better so gave these to me, they look as good as the first day and this is a timeless classic style that is always cool! Well made, nicely priced, good value.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: WRONG SUNGLASSES!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy into the headliner. These are not polarized glasses even thought I went through the original replace an item, the item received was not the same as the original item ordered
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Raschke

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Fashionable Sun Glasses for a Reasonable Price
customer_reviews.text: These are very solidly built glasses. They're very high quality And they look great. I buy a lot of sunglasses. And at $64, these were a real bargain. The only thing that would be nice to have purchased is lenses that adjust with the sunlight. The lenses on these glasses are dark enough that they are not useful to wear when it's bright out but not blinding sunlight. I bought the basic lenses. I believe there are some more expensive lenses you can choose to buy which can adjust to the light.
customer_reviews.author: Deal Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Ha
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be more happier with this purchase. At first I wasn't to sure because I have a big face but when I tired them on the fit prefect!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jones

customer_reviews.title: The sunglasses are legit and I love them! Was able to get them at a ...
customer_reviews.text: I had second thoughts of ordering a pair due to some other reviews stating that the glasses made not be legit. So I made sure that I bought them from Amazon ("ship and sold by Amazon"). The sunglasses are legit and I love them! Was able to get them at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Clasic style, wonderful form and function.
customer_reviews.text: Classical style that knocks the socks off the cheaper and more "modern" brands, both in form and function. I owned a pair of these back in the 90's and lost them in a rental car a few years ago. I was stunned by the price most places were asking for a replacement and went with a cheaper brand instead. When I saw these for the price, I had to have them again and not only that, my wife had to have a pair too!. They cut glare without distorting colors and are comfortable. Tip: if they don't quite fit, heat the arms gently with a hairdryer and bend gently to the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: Great for petite faces,  durable classic style with trendy twist
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. We both have petite faces. These fit great, smaller sized. Durable, smooth feel almost rubberized plastic arms. Great sun protection
customer_reviews.author: Erini

customer_reviews.title: Defective Ray Bans
customer_reviews.text: I received this ray bans well packaged but for some reason the frame was loose and squeaky when I went to put them on the lens seemed loose on the frame almost like if they had been replaced! Decided to return them maybe in the future I’ll give it another try I owned other ray bans never had this problem quality is always good except for this time it was very unfortunate
customer_reviews.author: Mario osegueda

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: X-WEAR promptly delivered a genuine pair of Ray Ban’s. First time dealing with this business and was surprised that the sunglasses were without any flaws or defects and actually new, unworn. Thanks again, X-WEAR
customer_reviews.author: M. Felter

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy!!!!! These are not real so I sent them back and finally got my refund for less than I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L.

customer_reviews.title: I buy ALOT on Amazon and have always had excellent products delivered
customer_reviews.text: I buy ALOT on Amazon and have always had excellent products delivered. These sunglasses truly appeared to be fake Ray Bans. I had another authentic pair to compare them with and this is what I found: Plastic seemed thin and not as sturdy. Joints and glasses as a whole were squeaky when you moved them around. Leather case was clearly not the same nor as sturdy as the real Ray Ban case. For $20-30 these would be decent sunglasses, but not for over $100 as I paid. I expected more buying directly from Amazon. I am certainly disappointed and will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Lenses are a little smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I know Ray-Ban Wayfarer Sunglasses are the standard when it comes to sunglasses. However, I was hoping the lenses would be a little larger from top to bottom as in the older days of sunglasses. I'm not into the narrow, skinny look and it makes converting these into bi-focals a pain. That's why I stick with my Sergio Tacchini's. However, they don't make my style anymore. Update: Returned these for refund. I found an set of Vaurnet Catseye frames that sell without the lens. Made turning them into a prescription pair of bifocal progressive sunglasses a snap. Look for them on Amazon. Sold by Shopeyeworld.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap fake Ray Ban sunglasses. Been wearing this brand and model for years, and when my last pair was accidentally crushed, I bought these to replace them. They are obviously fake as soon as you see them, plastic lenses, cheap single hinges and lightweight. Beware!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Problematic
customer_reviews.text: The gray on the front of the glasses is rubber. It scratches and peels off. I'm guessing this isn't an original rayban company product. Also the lens is supposed to be green, but it's way neutral. Pretty dark, so does block the sun a good bit. Should have sent them back, but I misplaced some of the packaged stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well made, timeless
customer_reviews.text: I have a jeep and one day my top was down and someone stole my Ray Ban Aviators. I was so upset because I loved them. I decided to give the wayfarers a try, and glad I did! Hard to compare them to the aviators cause they’re so different, but great sunglasses nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my boyfriend, really great sunglasses. He particularly liked the fact that these ray-ban frames are a bit thinner than the previous ('original') frames. He also liked the size of the frame for his face (we got the 55) which fit him better than most sunglasses. They also come in a brown (vs. the black) case, which I thought was a bit sharper. He's been wearing them almost continuously since I've got them for him, so I'd say, all awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: savms

customer_reviews.title: Sold by Amazon but FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this directly from Amazon but I believe I got a fake one. It was just wrapped in plastic. It did not have a case, cleaning cloth as specified in the description. I have bought Raybans in the past and they all came with the case, cloth, labels,etc. The manufacturer likewise states that each pair of their sunglasses come with a case. I can’t believe Amazon would directly sell fakes. Being “sold by Amazon”is no longer a stamp of product authenticity. I was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael

customer_reviews.title: The name says all
customer_reviews.text: I have had these sunglasses for several years and they are as good as new till now. Once my brother accidentally sat on it in when it was in the car passenger seat and it bent the joints. I took a plier and could set them back and it did not show any signs of breaking or any damage. If it was another brand, would be in the landfill soon after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonan

customer_reviews.title: Relieved and satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Even if these sunglasses hadn't fit as well as they do, I would still give these 4 star rating. Phenomenal brand, phenomenal quality. I'm not big into paying a bunch of money for a pair of sunglasses, so I came to Amazon and saved $50. My biggest worry was the fit, which is why I purchased these directly from Amazon.com so I could return them if I had a problem. Thankfully, they fit and looked perfect (and I have a weird-shaped nose too!). Aside from the purchase, I signed up for the free trial of Amazon Prime so I could get the 2 day shipping haha. Canceled right after, but it was nice to get them so soon! 100% satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: purchased these because everything I had read indicated they were ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased these because everything I had read indicated they were small and had a snug fit. Unfortunately they are not that slim fitting. They were still too big on my face and were too dark as well. All I needed was a cane in order to complete my blind man look. Gave them to a friend who has a bigger face, and he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Moore

customer_reviews.title: Good frames, good looks, but cheap lenses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a while ago to replace an older pair that I lost. Boy do I regret misplacing those! They were clearly better, with long-lasting, durable glass lenses. These new ones are great looking, lightweight and comfortable, but the plastic lenses are cheap, and vulnerable to scratches. If you're a little careless with your stuff, stay away from these. They won't hold up very long. On the other hand, if you handle these with care, like I do, they'll last a good, long time. The frames are super sturdy. But the lenses..? Not great.
customer_reviews.author: warbler

customer_reviews.title: I Love These Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are light weight and do a great job of reducing strong light without overly darkening. i.e. they keep things light. Often times I find myself wearing them into a store, my office or home, almost forgetting I'm wearing them. As for being non-polarized, it hasn't made a huge difference. I don't plan on wearing them boating our fishing anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad to the bones, brotha
customer_reviews.text: Fit: Perfect Style: Perfect Size compared to face: Medium Price tag: a steal Recommend to others?: Hell yea I use these glasses primarily for biking. I bike usually 5-6 hours at a time and these glasses hold up very well. Even with all the vibrations and bumps I endure along the uneven pavements of North California, I rarely have to re-position these glasses. I was originally planning to buy the RB2140s, but I hear they are a lot larger and sits on your face at a weird angle so its more prone to tilt (this is based on research). I suppose I chose functionality over originality. If you are looking for some semi-stunna shades, look no further!!
customer_reviews.author: Bluntman

customer_reviews.title: Polarized blisters within a month
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a pair with the polarized lenses and they were great for a few weeks. Loved them. But then the tint on the lenses started to blister up around the edges, so you'd get pockets of light/silver peaking through the glasses. I sent them back and thought it was just a bad draw of luck. Got the second pair and around week 4, same deal. Sent back for a refund. They turn to a waste of $100 within a months time.
customer_reviews.author: Steve K

customer_reviews.title: classic look for a classic style
customer_reviews.text: This item was a Christmas gift for my girlfriend and she absolutely loved it. It came in pretty fast and was exactly what I ordered. The coloring in the picture is spot on and you will get exactly what you order. The glasses themselves have a very classic look and sort of a Katherine Hepburn feel. Unfortunately she got a new dog and they got to them... -__-, the lenses are fine though, just the sides have bite marks. All in all, it's a win of a buy if it's what you are looking for. She has gotten numerous compliments and some girls have even walked up to her and told her that they ordered some just like hers.
customer_reviews.author: Clive Staples Leauis

customer_reviews.title: Don't get mad cause there are worst things  in life,
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews and pick a pair of ray ban wayfarer many pairs get ready to hit the order button and get worried they would not be what i was hopping for well guess what not only did i get the ones i really wanted and they were deliver one day after i ordered them so thank you and amazon does have a great return i love all the sunglasses i can not say how many i have bought but it help me thur some of all this craziness !
customer_reviews.author: kenny sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying em...
customer_reviews.text: I keep losing em and so I keep ordering em. Its a compulsory feeling after my first experience with wayfarer. I was walking around an art exhibit and found a brand new pair with no owner in sight. Ever since then I have lost em, got them stolen from me, stepped on them...each time I ultimately keep choosing to buy another pair. I love the feel, the look, and they're a decent pair of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These Make Me Look Cool
customer_reviews.text: These are classic Ray Ban sunglasses. They look cool and help the wearer look cool, as well. This version is not polarized, which means I can glance down and see my phone's screen without twisting my phone around or turning my head strangely. All of my other Ray-Bans had been polarized, which is great around water and on very sunny days. Unfortunately, the way my iPhone's screen was made, polarized sunglasses obscure the screen when the phone is at certain angles. Also, with these sunglasses you can read the instructions on the gas pump without taking them off.
customer_reviews.author: Tom J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses work great - Block an appropriate amount of sun and they are very fashionable. Couple things to note: -The 52mm lenses are much smaller than they seem compared to the 55mm. If you have a small face, definitely go with the 52mm. -Expect to see some light from the top or bottom of these glasses - these aren't made to completely block all light. -If you have light colored eyes, I highly suggest getting the polarized version of these glasses. -Also, if you have a narrow face, expect these to fall off if you look down. Overall, I greatly enjoy this product! I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sherwin

customer_reviews.title: and the lenses should resist scratching much better than my other cheaper sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of sunglasses that cost over $20, and I believe I've chosen well. Feel as though they are high quality, and the lenses should resist scratching much better than my other cheaper sunglasses, and you can't beat the look. Classic. If you are a fashion moron like myself, these are a no brainer. They will make you look better than your stupid terminator sunglasses you have now. (think Dwight Schrute.) Buy 'em.
customer_reviews.author: R. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Update to a Classic Style
customer_reviews.text: These sun glasses look and feel great. These are the "New Wayfarer" style from Ray Ban so they are slightly smaller than the previous iterations. The crystal green lens is great for bright weather and driving on sunny days. Might be a bit too dark in partly cloudy or overcast weather if you are not accustomed to them. The glasses themselves are typical Ray Ban quality, which is quite good and they are not too heavy and don't really cause me too much fatigue wearing them for long periods of time. They fit quite comfortably actually. I would definitely recommend them for a good daily use pair of sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Carrera356

customer_reviews.title: Good for guys with big heads
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting a nice pair of sunglasses for some time now and I've been putting it off because they're so expensive, but I'm really glad I bought these Ray-Bans! I tried them on at a couple different local retailers but they wanted $120 plus for these! So I looked them up here and the prices are way more reasonable. The fit and finish on these are incredible, I have a pretty big head and I can wear these all day long without discomfort and the lenses just have to be experienced. If you are on the fence, just do it!
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Nice sunglasses, lousey shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Opps- Amazon asked me to review my Ray ban sunglasses. but the interrogatory questions are for shoes? How to proceed? Or, do sunglasses have arch support? I don't think so...
customer_reviews.author: rainman

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses and for the price it's definitely awesome recommended to anyone who needs a pair it came with the sunglasses a case and cleaning cloth and some wipes to clean the shades
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Real deal.
customer_reviews.text: These are genuine RayBan-new wayfarers. Made in Italy. I used the frames and made prescription sunglasses out of them, works awesomely.
customer_reviews.author: James D

customer_reviews.title: Authentic New Wayfarers from Italy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these black frames for my son to save him money. Perfect fit at 52. In the optometrist's office the same frames were $180, I paid $79 through Amazon. They came in perfect condition, in a nice box with cloth, case, and booklet. They had all the right markings so I knew they were real Ray Bans. I did order prescription lenses (polycarbonate/crizal) from the optometrist and the glasses look great. I haven't tried ordering prescription lenses online yet. He is very happy with them. Another great experience with Amazon. I would highly recommend these New Wayfarer frames by Ray Ban.
customer_reviews.author: rsg

customer_reviews.title: They run big!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Raybans I've purchased through amazon and I think they are the real thing! The first pair I bought were 55's and the more I wear them the more I realize they are way too big. I ended up giving them to my husband and just purchased the 52's. I am not a petit person and the 52's fit way better!
customer_reviews.author: N Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Strange feel and material
customer_reviews.text: I got my first pair and immediately knew it was wrong. While holding the sunglasses the material squeaked like it was about to break, so I returned them and order a second pair. This is the pair I'm reviewing, which is better than the previous, but still not solid. I've owned other ray-ban sunglasses, and even order a different model alongside this one. All of them the same black glossy material, none of them have had this issue. I haven't been able to return them, because I went on vacation and needed my sunglasses, squeaky or not, but I'm completely dissatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Majluf

customer_reviews.title: 100% Fake
customer_reviews.text: These felt so cheap. Worse than gas station glasses. I did not even think about keeping them for one second. These are so bad that they have to be fake. No way real Ray-Bans are made like this. I have owned several pair of these glasses and knew the second that I opened up the package that they were knock offs. Amazon needs to do a better job of policing it products.
customer_reviews.author: Tod S.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I received these today and they are...Okay. I have worn the original model ray-ban's and those have a heavier more well-built feeling that these right out the box do not have the same feeling. These have the feeling of light non-quality plastic... I have bought the wayfarer style glasses from walmart that honestly did feel like better quality than these. I will wait a day or two to decide if I want to return them and possible purchase the original model. They are just not what I expected from Ray-Ban. These also have a scuff, barley noticeable, on the end of the left arm.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: These originals are always the way to go! And Amazon didn’t amazing job of delivering! My husband loves his sunglasses and they fit amazing! I will definitely buy again what a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda and Ian Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: The original cool shades
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with a classic. The new Wayfarer is a little less framey than the original and has less rake (tilt). The packaging was perfect, RayBan is good about protecting it during shipment so it arrived in perfect condition. Remember these are matte finish so they will show scuff marks over time. Also the matte coating is a rubber-like coating over the normal frames which will wear thin/ off on the edges over time. My last pair is 2 years old and is showing its age.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: These sunglasses Rock!
customer_reviews.text: I really like how they look! finding sunglasses that are the right size and look nice can be hard to do during the pandemic. I will be bringing them in to have prescription lenses put in as soon as I am able to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great Raybans and great lenses
customer_reviews.text: These are the best wayfarers RayBan makes... the brown lenses makes everything easy to see, even on cloudy days
customer_reviews.author: Maverick

customer_reviews.title: I'm in LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: These are and excellent pair of sunglasses! I am an adult with a smaller face, and these fit me wonderfully. I often have trouble finding glasses and sunglasses that aren't huge on me, and these certainly fit me well. They are very comfortable and sturdy. Item arrived very quickly, packaged well, and are definitely the genuine product. Item arrived in a Ray-Ban box, with a Ray-Ban glasses case and cloth. The product numbers on the temple are Ray-Ban codes. I purchased the rubber frames, and I like the feel and slight grip they provide. Lenses have a green tint, but clarity is wonderful! I would certainly purchase another pair from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: zena728

customer_reviews.title: Ray-Ban RB2132
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered a pair for my fiancee's birthday in 2 weeks. They look and feel great; I even tried them on;). The only thing that threw me off was that it didn't have the ICONS booklet that usually comes with the real pair. I went on youtube and watched a couple of reviews on this product. it doesn't have the 7 barrel metal hinges; the RB on the side doesn't seem to be x-rayed in but etched in with a sharp tool. Everything else seems to be in correct order. I hope and pray that they are authentic. Any thoughts?
customer_reviews.author: funmiford

customer_reviews.title: Real Ray Bans says I.
customer_reviews.text: There's been a bit of question over the authenticity of these. They passed every test I could find online. One user complained that they must be fake because when you flex them they are squeaky...and they are. When I was trying on authentic Ray Bans at the Sunglass store at the mall (to figure out what model/size I liked) I noticed that they were squeaky as well. That might be a reflection of how Ray Bans are made nowadays, but I don't think that means these are counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Clarke

product_meta.title: Ray-Ban Rb2132 New Wayfarer Sunglasses
product_meta.description:
Ray-Ban RB2132 New Wayfarer sunglasses take the iconic shape of the Classic Wayfarer and infuse a slightly smaller frame and softer eye shape perfect for women and men. These unisex sunglasses are non-polarized. All Ray-Ban sunglasses are made from superior materials, and these unisex non-polarized sunglasses are no exception. RB2132 unisex Wayfarer frames are manufactured from durable nylon, making them lightweight and able to hold up against frequent use. Our Wayfarer sunglasses utilize famous G-15 lenses, which are prescription ready and made from glass.

Ray-Ban allows you to choose from a variety of frame colors and lens treatments including crystal green, brown or gradient styles. All Ray-Ban New Wayfarer Classic sunglasses are designed to offer an easy fit with a high level of visual clarity and protection. The sunglasses are available in a variety of size options to ensure a relaxed yet comfortable fit. Our glass lenses help protect your eyes against harmful UV rays and have been coated with 100% UV protection. Ray-Ban glasses are comprised of precision-cut lenses that reduce eye strain when worn.

Ray-Ban unisex sunglasses are comfortable and effective to wear on cloudy and hazy days, when the sun is bright, and during sunrise and sunset.
feature_bullets: UNISEX NON-POLARIZED SUNGLASSES: The Ray-Ban New Wayfarer sunglasses feature the legendary Ray-Ban crystal lenses. Made from high-quality glass, Ray-Ban lenses are prescription ready.
100% UV PROTECTION: To protect your eyes from harmful UV rays, these non-polarized sunglasses include glass lenses that are coated with 100% UV protection.
REDUCE EYE STRAIN: New Wayfarer sunglasses feature precision-cut, scratch-resistant glass lenses that improve visual clarity, and help reduce eye strain while outdoors.

DURABLE NYLON FRAMES: Our New Wayfarer sunglasses are incredibly durable. The frame is made from lightweight yet strong nylon construction. The bridge measures 18 mm, and the arms are 145 mm for an easy, comfortable fit.
MULTIPLE FRAME AND LENS COLORS: Choose from multiple frame colors—including black and tortoise—and multiple lens colors and treatments—including non-polarized gradient lenses.
MULTIPLE SIZE OPTIONS: Choose from a variety of size options including 52mm, 55mm or 58mm.
CASE & LENS CLOTH INCLUDED: Each pair of Ray-Ban sunglasses comes with a case and lens cloth to clean and protect them from scratches and damage.
VISIT THE RAY-BAN BRAND SHOP: Click on the Ray-Ban logo above to view the entire Ray-Ban brand assortment.
